message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's only fair to present this opportunity to you at a price of $11500. This is a special offer considering the value you see in the product, which is worth $12000 to you. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $11000 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between the value you see in it and my need to recover some of the investment. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product. This reflects a compromise between the value you see in it and the price I am willing to accept. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9800 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10250. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I've carefully considered your most recent offer. In an effort to reach an agreement, I would like to propose a final price of $10000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the value you see in it and what I can reasonably expect for my investment. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and we can conclude this transaction.
